short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to right click on any link and save it to your bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Bookmark Saver allows you to right-click any link and add it to the bookmarks bar without having to load the page or select which folder. Just right-click the link, select "Add to EZ Bookmark" and that's it.
